content.body: I don't understand what you mean smaug? What you're linking to is just defining the layout of the struct. Initializing the struct happens elsewhere.
content.formatted_body: I don't understand what you mean smaug? What you're linking to is just defining the layout of the struct. Initializing the struct happens elsewhere.

content.body: Hi there! I’m Chrissy, a lover of baking, open source, and the Oxford Comma! :) I learned about this project while making a pull request for MDN Web Docs, and decided to join. I’m interested in technical writing, so does the repo have any docs-related good first issue that you can recommend?
How does one start a proposal without using Microsoft GitHub? Is there an independent forum or mailing list?

> <@annevk:matrix.org> sideshowbarker: https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/9643

Thanks for the heads-up — fixed now
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @annevk:matrix.org
sideshowbarker: https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/9643
Thanks for the heads-up — fixed now

content.body: toastal: there is not, but you could write something on your own website
content.formatted_body: toastal: there is not, but you could write something on your own website

content.body:
> <@annevk:matrix.org> toastal: there is not, but you could write something on your own website

That’s a bummer with the proprietary lock-in.

I wrote a [half-proposal as a blog](https://toast.al/posts/softwarecraft/2023-08-29_semantic-markup-for-callouts) yesterday, but I wanted to get some general feedback before trying something like a more official proposal.
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @annevk:matrix.org
toastal: there is not, but you could write something on your own website

That’s a bummer with the proprietary lock-in.

I wrote a half-proposal as a blog yesterday, but I wanted to get some general feedback before trying something like a more official proposal.

content.body: If anyone would be interested in try to clean up & make a more substantial proposal for a `<callout>` (and maybe `<cot>`) element, please reach out to me!
content.formatted_body: If anyone would be interested in try to clean up & make a more substantial proposal for a <callout> (and maybe <cot>) element, please reach out to me!

content.body: I would however prefer to keep as much data as possible away from Microsoft-owned platforms.
